1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Could unknown family secrets break apart a close friendship? Zhao Yi Hong (Chen Ya An) grew up in a family of fencing athletes and she is determined to make her mark in the sport also. Leng Zi Feng (Jiang Jin Fu) is a rising star in boxing, but when he meets Yi Hong, he decides to change his career path and switches over to fencing. Chinese drama with English captions.

imdb.plot outline: The drama tells the story of a group of young men and women who love fencing, after the ups and downs, they beyond themselves, and ultimately stand on the world stage, glory for their country. While they breaking off the difficulty, repelling the enemy, they also hitting the true love, they share happiness and woe.
